@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package io.libraft

Client interface to the Raft distributed consensus algorithm.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Command Implemented by an object that a client wants to replicate to the Raft cluster.
Raft Interface through which a client interacts with the Raft cluster.
RaftListener Implemented by up-call code that wants to be notified of important events in the Raft cluster.
 

Class Summary
CommittedCommand Holder class that pairs a committed Command and its Raft log index.
 

Exception Summary
NotLeaderException Thrown when a Command is submitted to a Raft instance and it is not the leader.
RaftException Base class for all checked exceptions thrown by a Raft implementation.
ReplicationException Thrown when a Raft instance cannot guarantee that a Command was durably replicated to the Raft cluster.
 

Package io.libraft Description

Client interface to the Raft distributed consensus algorithm.

Clients need only to interact with the objects and interfaces defined in this package. There are three major interfaces defined:

  1. Command: application object to be replicated to the Raft cluster.
  2. Raft: interface through which the client controls and interacts with Raft cluster.
  3. RaftListener: up-call listener, through which clients are notified of important events in the Raft cluster.
